remarks: Formula building theorem for support restriction, on a function which preserves zero.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ suppssfv as of 28-May-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
suppssfvOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. D |-> A ) " ( _V \ { Y } ) ) C_ L ) $.
suppssfvOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` Y ) = Z ) $.
suppssfvOLD.v $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> A e. V ) $.
suppssfvOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. D |-> ( F ` A ) ) " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) C_ L ) $.
$d Y x $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x $.
